_header: O how wholesome and glad is the memory
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: John Lydgate, ‘Testament’, in five sections—sections 1, 3, and 5 in 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc); sections 2 and 4 in rhyme royal
